introduction:
Week 2! Give it up for Week 2! What a time to be alive. Thanks to everyone who voted for power rankings this week, 11 of 12 teams responded and are cool as hell. The 1 person who did not vote for rankings this week, who shall remain nameless (Steve), can sit on their balls in hell. 

It’s a new year, but it may as well be 2020 again because Schempp sits atop the power rankings with Marquin right behind him. Literally every voter put Schempp first, and all but 1 voter but Marquin in 2nd. Some things never change. 

Week 2 Power Rankings, let’s go.
